scripts.build: pwd && node modifyWorkspace.js && yarn && yarn tsc && cd ./build && yarn
scripts.build:dist: shx rm -rf build-dist && tsc -b tsconfig.dist.json && yarn copy:dist
scripts.build:da: cd double-agent && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:js-path: cd js-path && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:spec: cd specifications && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:agent: cd agent && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:uas: cd real-user-agents && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:prof: cd browser-profiler && pwd && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build:all: node modifyWorkspace.js pre && yarn build:js-path && yarn build:spec && yarn build:agent && yarn build:uas && yarn build:da && yarn build:prof && yarn build
scripts.copy:dist: ulx-repo-after-build --dist && shx cp -r "browser-emulator-builder/data" "build-dist/plugins/default-browser-emulator" && node adjustPaths.js build-dist
scripts.tsc: tsc -b -i tsconfig.json && yarn copy:build && node adjustPaths.js
scripts.watch:all: concurrently -n jspath,spec,plugins,agent,da,prof,uas "cd js-path && yarn watch" "cd specifications && yarn watch" "yarn watch" "cd agent && yarn watch" "cd double-agent && yarn watch" "cd browser-profiler && yarn watch" "cd real-user-agents && yarn watch"
scripts.test:all: yarn copy:build && cross-env UBK_DATA_DIR=.data-test NODE_ENV=test jest
